name: markdownlint
description: A Node.js style checker and lint tool for Markdown/CommonMark files.
author: David Anson (https://dlaa.me/)

scripts.test: tape test/markdownlint-test.js test/markdownlint-test-custom-rules.js test/markdownlint-test-helpers.js test/markdownlint-test-result-object.js test/markdownlint-test-scenarios.js
scripts.test-cover: c8 --check-coverage --branches 100 --functions 100 --lines 100 --statements 100 tape test/markdownlint-test.js test/markdownlint-test-custom-rules.js test/markdownlint-test-helpers.js test/markdownlint-test-result-object.js test/markdownlint-test-scenarios.js
scripts.ci: npm run test-cover && npm run lint && npm run test-declaration
scripts.build-demo: cpy node_modules/markdown-it/dist/markdown-it.min.js demo && cd demo && rimraf markdownlint-browser.* && cpy file-header.js . --rename=markdownlint-browser.js && tsc --allowJs --resolveJsonModule --outDir ../lib-es3 ../lib/markdownlint.js && cpy ../helpers/package.json ../lib-es3/helpers && browserify ../lib-es3/lib/markdownlint.js --standalone markdownlint >> markdownlint-browser.js && browserify ../lib-es3/helpers/helpers.js --standalone helpers >> markdownlint-rule-helpers-browser.js && uglifyjs markdownlint-browser.js markdownlint-rule-helpers-browser.js --compress --mangle --comments --output markdownlint-browser.min.js
scripts.build-example: npm install --no-save --ignore-scripts grunt grunt-cli gulp through2
scripts.example: cd example && node standalone.js && grunt markdownlint --force && gulp markdownlint
scripts.clone-test-repos: mkdir test-repos && cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/eslint/eslint eslint-eslint --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet && git clone https://github.com/mkdocs/mkdocs mkdocs-mkdocs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet && git clone https://github.com/pi-hole/docs pi-hole-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-large: npm run clone-test-repos && cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/dotnet/docs dotnet-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
